overview: Cheesy, campy, fun - The uptight Captain of a decrepit ship must travel to Saturn's moon Titan with a bumbling mechanic and a cheeky A.I.. After arriving at Titan, they'll have to survive an alien encounter and save Earth from a terrifying ancient evil. Dead Drift is Red Dwarf meets youtube. A screwball buddy comedy in space, told by characters interacting via video communication consoles.
title: Dead Drift
